fields.name: text1
fields.fieldText:

fields.name: noeprsmessage
fields.fieldText: There are no EPRs for the resource {!Get_Service_Appointment.Allocated_Engineer_First_Name__c} {!Get_Service_Appointment.Allocated_Engineer_Last_Name__c} against this Work Order. Please create a new EPR.
